description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar Bumper Cars is a 1-4 player arena battle game.  Watch your avatar take control of a bumper car in one of 5 different arenas and face off against either your friends or the computer in an action packed battle!  Use your car's spikes to hit their gas cans and send them flying out of the arena.  Will you be the last man standing?
description.short: Avatar Bumper Cars is a 1-4 player arena battle game.
